name: Due on Receipt
description: Payment due immediately upon receipt of invoice

name: Net 15
description: Payment due within 15 days of invoice date

name: Net 30
description: Payment due within 30 days of invoice date

name: Net 60
description: Payment due within 60 days of invoice date

name: 2/10 Net 30
description: 2% discount if paid within 10 days, otherwise full amount due within 30 days

name: COD
description: Cash on delivery, payment collected at time of delivery
